mapper.insert: insert into t_user(userid, userpwd, username, email, zipcode, addr, birth) values(#{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{username}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{addr}, #{birth})
mapper.select: select idx from t_user where userid = #{param1}
select idx, userid, username, email, regDT, point from t_user
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_user WHERE DATE(regDT) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_user WHERE regDT >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY

SELECT ol.idx AS orderList_idx, p.detail_img,p.title, p.price, ol.amount, ol.orderState, p.idx FROM T_orderList ol JOIN T_order o ON ol.order_idx = o.idx JOIN T_product p ON ol.pro_idx = p.idx LEFT JOIN T_review r ON ol.idx = r.orderList_idx WHERE ol.orderState = 6 AND o.useridx = ${param1} -- 토큰에서 가져온 useridx AND r.orderList_idx IS NULL
